author: RTÉ News
title: Irishman in US shares pain of losing mother to virus
description: An Irishman living in the US has spoken of his heartbreak after his mother died from Covid-19 in Ireland.
content:
An Irishman living in the US has spoken of his heartbreak after his mother died from Covid-19 in Ireland.
Speaking on RTÉ's Liveline, Brian Connell said: "My instincts tell me to get a bag and head for the airport to be with my family at this time but that's… [+1793 chars]
